heading.title: A few favorite projects I've worked on

jobs.title: Engineering Manager
jobs.description: As an Engineering Manager, I lead the Engineering department forward by balancing the best interest of each individual on our team, the needs of each of our projects, and streamlining our department processes. I am invested in each person's growth - which involves having honest conversations about their goals and having a hands on approach for areas of growth.

jobs.title: Senior Developer
jobs.description: As a Senior Developer I led on a variety of projects with a various technology stacks such as React, Gatsby, Drupal, etc. With my experience, I also had a great opportunity to start mentorship - as well as internship programs to help our team grow both professionally and with their technical skills.

jobs.title: Supervisor, Web Services
jobs.description: At VCS I led the Web Services team that was responsible for all web properties for the school district including the redesign of 70 school websites and a district website including over 100 department subsites.

jobs.title: Manager, Web Content
jobs.description: At Furniture Leisure I was a content manager and strategist for 5 eCommerce websites. Oversaw the relaunch of 2 eCommerce websites to an upgraded system, new design, and revamped content for SEO.

jobs.title: Bachelor's in Science - Information Technology
jobs.description: Bachelor's in Science where I learned the core concepts of web development.

heading_skills.title: A Mix of Management + Tech Skills

contact.description: Engineering Manager with 8 years experience in leading teams & developing projects from concept to implementation.

thought_items.title: When Drupal Met Gatsby, an Early Adopters Case Study
